channel.title: Emmure! :D
channel.description:
Well, you have to have a taste for this kind of music to like it, but oh well.
Just thought I would post, that this is my new favorite band. I don't really like their first CD. The new one pwns though.
I would highly recommend downloading the CD quality songs rather than listening to them there, for best sound of course.
http://www.myspace.com/emmure
Listen to When Keeping It Real Goes Wrong, You Got A Henna Tattoo That Said Forever, and 10 Signs that you should leave.
He has awesomely deep growls/screams, and for the sake of enjoying it more, it's great to follow the lyrics.
http://www.darklyrics.com/lyrics/emmure/goodbyetothegallows.html#1
